model.name: convertVariableTo
model.title: Convert Variable To
model.description: Converts the variable to another type
model.label: eip,transformation

id.description: Sets the id of this node

note.description: Sets the note of this node

description.description: Sets the description of this node

disabled.label: advanced
disabled.description: Disables this EIP from the route.

name.description: Name of variable to convert its value The simple language can be used to define a dynamic evaluated header name to be used. Otherwise a constant name will be used.

type.description: The java type to convert to

toName.description: To use another variable to store the result. By default, the result is stored in the same variable. This option allows to use another variable. The simple language can be used to define a dynamic evaluated variable name to be used. Otherwise a constant name will be used.

mandatory.label: advanced
mandatory.description: When mandatory then the conversion must return a value (cannot be null), if this is not possible then NoTypeConversionAvailableException is thrown. Setting this to false could mean conversion is not possible and the value is null.

charset.label: advanced
charset.description: To use a specific charset when converting
